name: split-personality
description: Split Personality - A household chore management app that assigns monetary values to chores for equitable distribution

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run db:setup
scripts.build:production: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push

author: Split Personality Team
